name: mcp-server-sentry
description: Retrieving and analyzing issues from Sentry.io.

rating.reason: The tool has a clear, specific name and an excellent description that comprehensively covers functionality, use cases, and what information it provides. The parameter documentation is adequate with a clear description of the expected input format, though it could benefit from examples of valid formats (e.g., 'SENTRY-123' vs full URL format).
